html.head:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> 
<meta charset="UTF-8">
html.below:
<link href="https://api.fontshare.com/css?f[]=bespoke-serif@400,401,500,700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:ital,wght@0,300;0,400;0,500;0,600;0,700;1,400;1,500;1,600;1,700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

code.html:
Home {title}
{date}

{title}

{#each links as {link,icon}} {link.label} {/each}
{#if image.url} {/if}

{name} {#each site_nav as {link}} {link.label} {/each}
{#if mobileNavOpen}
{name} {#each site_nav as {link}} {link.label} {/each}
{/if}

{heading}

{@html description}
    {#each items as {label,icon}}
  • {label}
    • {/each}

{heading}

{email}
Copyright {(new Date()).getFullYear()} Primo Powered
    {#each social_links as {link, icon}}
    • {/each}

{heading}

    {#each items as item}
  • {item.date}

    {item.title}

    {@html item.description}
    {#each item.links as {link}} {link.label} {/each}
    {#if item.thumbnail.url} {/if}
    • {/each}

{name}

{@html description}
    {#each social_links as { link, icon }}
  • {link.label}
    • {/each}
